mapper.insert: insert into tb_xianshiqingkuang ( countryname, countryyear, countryprovince, countrycity, countryposition, countryarea, countryallpeople, countryregion, countrygdp, countryrate, countryfinance, countryrates, countryfisheries, countryindustry, countryinvest, countryratess, countryincome, countrytownincome, countryother, countryhistory, countrysight, countrynative, countryfumin, countryservice, countryagriculture, countryothers, countrytarget, countrytask, countrycapital, countryotherss, countryentry, updatetime) values ( #{countryname}, #{countryyear}, #{countryprovince}, #{countrycity}, #{countryposition}, #{countryarea}, #{countryallpeople}, #{countryregion}, #{countrygdp}, #{countryrate}, #{countryfinance}, #{countryrates}, #{countryfisheries}, #{countryindustry}, #{countryinvest}, #{countryratess}, #{countryincome}, #{countrytownincome}, #{countryother}, #{countryhistory}, #{countrysight}, #{countrynative}, #{countryfumin}, #{countryservice}, #{countryagriculture}, #{countryothers}, #{countrytarget}, #{countrytask}, #{countrycapital}, #{countryotherss}, #{countryentry}, now())
mapper.select:
SELECT a.countryid,
b.name as countryprovince, c.name as countrycity a.countryentry FROM tb_xianshiqingkuang a LEFT JOIN tb_area_province b on a.countryprovince=b.code LEFT JOIN tb_area_city c on a.countrycity=c.code where 1=1 and a.visual=1
${supersearch}
order by b.code,c.code,createtime desc,a.countryid desc

select countryid, a.countryname, a.countryyear, a.countryprovince, a.countrycity, a.countryposition, a.countryarea, a.countryallpeople, a.countryregion, a.countrygdp, a.countryrate, a.countryfinance, a.countryrates, a.countryfisheries, a.countryindustry, a.countryinvest, a.countryratess, a.countryincome, a.countrytownincome, a.countryother, a.countryhistory, a.countrysight, a.countrynative, a.countryfumin, a.countryservice, a.countryagriculture, a.countryothers, a.countrytarget, a.countrytask, a.countrycapital, a.countryotherss, a.countryentry from tb_xianshiqingkuang a where a.countryid = #{countryid}
